lead_paragraph: Host Ghana and Ivory Coast reached the African Cup of Nations semifinals, staying on course to meet in the final next Sunday. Ghana beat Nigeria, 2-1, and Ivory Coast routed Guinea, 5-0.
snippet: Host Ghana and Ivory Coast reached the African Cup of Nations semifinals, staying on course to meet in the final next Sunday. Ghana beat Nigeria, 2-1, and Ivory Coast routed Guinea, 5-0.
